mapper.select: SELECT p.product_id AS productId, p.picture_base64 AS pictureBase64, p.name, p.description, p.price, p.features, AVG(r.rating) AS averageRating, p.created_at AS createdAt FROM product p JOIN reviews r ON p.product_id = r.product_id GROUP BY p.product_id ORDER BY average_rating DESC LIMIT 5
